document.full_text: japanese authorities battling to contain rising pressure in nuclear reactors damaged by a massive earthquake were forced to release radioactive steam from one plant on saturday after evacuating tens of thousands of residents from the area.
document.title: japan battles crisis at quake-hit nuclear plants
lines_and_colors: japanese authorities battling to contain rising pressure in nuclear reactors damaged by a massive earthquake were forced to release radioactive steam from one plant on saturday after evacuating tens of thousands of residents from the area.
